name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】桃鈴ねね x 星街すいせい x 常闇トワ　Christmas Live【 #ねねすいトワクリスマスライブ 】 [VVQQcI6r3NU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa, Hoshimachi Suisei, and Momosuzu Nene perform a cover of 'Christmas Song'.
The three VTubers talk to the audience and reflect on their performances so far during the Christmas Live.

subtitles.original: …街に君を探してる
subtitles.english: ...I'm looking for you in the city.

subtitles.original: こんな日は他の誰かと笑ってるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're laughing with someone else on a day like this.

subtitles.original: 胸の奥の奥が苦しくなる
subtitles.english: The deepest part of my heart starts to ache.

subtitles.original: できれば横にいて欲しくて
subtitles.english: If possible, I want you by my side.

subtitles.original: どこにも行って欲しくなくて
subtitles.english: I don't want you to go anywhere.

subtitles.original: 僕のことだけをずっと考えていて欲しい
subtitles.english: I want you to only think about me forever.

subtitles.original: やっぱりこんなこと言ったら格好悪いし
subtitles.english: As I thought, saying things like this makes me look uncool.

subtitles.original: 長くなるだけだからまとめるよ
subtitles.english: It'll only get long, so I'll wrap it up.

subtitles.original: 君が好きだ
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: 聞こえるまで何度だって言うよ
subtitles.english: I'll say it as many times as it takes for you to hear.

subtitles.original: 君が好きだ
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: というわけでクリスマス衣装に着替えて
subtitles.english: So, we've changed into our Christmas outfits

subtitles.original: back numberさんの「クリスマスソング」をお届けしました！
subtitles.english: and performed back number's "Christmas Song"!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: なんか…ｗ
subtitles.english: Somehow... lol

subtitles.original: なんで笑ってるの？ｗ
subtitles.english: Why are you laughing? lol

subtitles.original: なんかさ、なんかトワ様一回さｗ
subtitles.english: I mean, Towa-sama, at one point... lol

subtitles.original: なかった！そんなことなかった！ｗ
subtitles.english: No! That didn't happen! lol

subtitles.original: なーかった！
subtitles.english: It didn't happen!

subtitles.original: トワすごいさ、マジですぐ表情に出る…ｗ
subtitles.english: Towa, seriously, it shows on your face right away... lol

subtitles.original: この…ｗ
subtitles.english: This... lol

subtitles.original: みんなももしかして見えちゃった？
subtitles.english: Did everyone happen to see it too?

subtitles.original: トワサンタが見えちゃったんじゃないの？一瞬ｗ
subtitles.english: Didn't you see Towa-Santa for a split second? lol

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、侵入してる形跡がありましたけれどもｗ
subtitles.english: There were some signs of a break-in, though lol

subtitles.original: ちょっと面白かったｗ
subtitles.english: It was a bit funny lol

subtitles.original: こらえるの必死だったｗ
subtitles.english: I was desperate to hold it in lol

subtitles.original: はい！じゃあ、ここまでの曲の話をしていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Alright! Then, let's talk about the songs we've done so far!

subtitles.original: 歌ってきた曲！
subtitles.english: The songs we sang!

subtitles.original: まずは「ロキ」、ねねとトワが歌いましたね！
subtitles.english: First was "ROKI", which Nene and Towa sang!

subtitles.original: もうすっごい自由にいーやってた！ｗ
subtitles.english: We were just doing it so freely! lol

subtitles.original: ぴんぴん！
subtitles.english: Ping-ping!

subtitles.original: 歌いました！オタ芸踊りました！
subtitles.english: We sang it! And did our geek dance!

subtitles.original: 練習と全然違うことしました！ｗ
subtitles.english: We did something completely different from the rehearsal! lol

subtitles.original: グルグルしてましたねｗ
subtitles.english: You guys were spinning around lol

subtitles.original: グルグルしちゃったｗ
subtitles.english: We ended up spinning lol

subtitles.original: はい！そして次、すいちゃんとトワで「灰色と青」歌いました！
subtitles.english: Alright! And next, Sui-chan and Towa sang "Gray and Blue"!

subtitles.original: 歌いました！
subtitles.english: We sang it!

subtitles.original: すごいいかったよ！
subtitles.english: It was really good!

subtitles.original: おっ、これ！おっ、これね！
subtitles.english: Oh, this! Oh, this one!

subtitles.original: 言っていいかな？言っちゃえ、言っちゃえ！
subtitles.english: Can I say it? Go ahead, go ahead!

subtitles.original: 寄ったら？
subtitles.english: How about getting closer?

subtitles.original: 寄るわｗ
subtitles.english: I'll get closer lol

subtitles.original: 寄りな、寄りなｗ
subtitles.english: Get close, get close lol

subtitles.original: カメラ！カメラさんちょっと、こっちだけ！こっちだけ！
subtitles.english: Camera! Mr. Camera, just here! Just here!

subtitles.original: 灰色と青なんですけれども…
subtitles.english: About "Gray and Blue"...

subtitles.original: はい！近日、動画がアップされます！
subtitles.english: Yes! A video will be uploaded soon!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！すごーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Amazing!

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ、ちょっとね、この日めがけて頑張って作ってました！
subtitles.english: That's right, we were working hard on it aiming for this day!

subtitles.original: はい！そうなの！
subtitles.english: Yes! Exactly!

subtitles.original: トワのチャンネルでアップ予定な動画なので、
subtitles.english: It's scheduled to be uploaded on Towa's channel,

subtitles.original: みんなぜひぜひ楽しみに待って、チェックしておいてくれたら嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: so I'd be happy if everyone looks forward to it and checks it out!

subtitles.original: 楽しみに待っててください！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい！そして…
subtitles.english: Okay! And then...

subtitles.original: ねねすいの「DEPARTURES」、あなたに贈る愛の歌。
subtitles.english: Nene-Sui's "DEPARTURES", a love song dedicated to you.

subtitles.original: どうだった？切な可愛いみたいな感じじゃなかった？
subtitles.english: How was it? Wasn't it like painfully cute?

subtitles.original: いや、助け…良かったよね！
subtitles.english: No, it help... It was great, right!

subtitles.original: 歌、良かったよねー！
subtitles.english: The singing was great!

subtitles.original: すごーい！最後のところめっちゃ凄いと思った、本当に！
subtitles.english: Amazing! I thought the last part was really incredible, seriously!

subtitles.original: いや、でもねねちもすごい頑張って…
subtitles.english: No, but Nene-chi also worked really hard...

subtitles.original: うぁー！頑張って…ねっ、一緒に歌ってた。
subtitles.english: Waa! She worked hard... yeah, we sang it together.

subtitles.original: ね、ねねちもめっちゃ必死だったからさｗ
subtitles.english: Yeah, Nene-chi was really desperate too lol

subtitles.original: 私ね、このあと「クリスマスソング」歌うじゃないですか。
subtitles.english: You know, I'm going to sing "Christmas Song" after this.

subtitles.original: で、ここで気づいたんですよ。「クリスマスソング」歌いながら私気づいたんですけど、
subtitles.english: And I realized something. While singing "Christmas Song", I noticed...

subtitles.original: 今日バラードばかり歌ってる。ｗ
subtitles.english: We're singing nothing but ballads today. lol

subtitles.original: 確かに！
subtitles.english: True!

subtitles.original: でしょ？でもクリスマスっぽいよね、なんかバラードって。確かに、確かに。
subtitles.english: Right? But ballads feel Christmassy. True, true.

subtitles.original: 今日はね、セトリはクリスマスっぽいヤツを選んできたんでね。
subtitles.english: Today, I chose a setlist with a Christmas vibe.

subtitles.original: 泣いたって、泣いたって！
subtitles.english: People cried! People cried!

subtitles.original: 泣いたも。助かる、涙助かるｗ
subtitles.english: We cried too. It's a lifesaver, those tears are a lifesaver lol

subtitles.original: 涙助かる。泣きそうだったｗ
subtitles.english: Tears are a lifesaver. I almost cried lol

subtitles.original: 本当にｗ
subtitles.english: Seriously lol

subtitles.original: 「クリスマスソング」もね、みんなで「ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！」ってしてねｗ
subtitles.english: Even for "Christmas Song", everyone was going "Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!" lol

subtitles.original: これ、なんと…始まる前のリハの時に、
subtitles.english: This, believe it or not... during the rehearsal before the show,

subtitles.original: じゃんけんをして勝った人がセンター。ｗ
subtitles.english: we played rock-paper-scissors, and the winner got to be the center. lol

subtitles.original: そうそうそうｗ
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah lol

subtitles.original: すいちゃんが勝ったんだよね！じゃんけんで勝ってる！
subtitles.english: Sui-chan won, right! I'm winning at rock-paper-scissors!

subtitles.original: 「よっしゃー！」つって、センターいただきましたとｗ
subtitles.english: I was like "Yessir!" and took the center position lol

subtitles.original: ちょっとあの台本ペラペラ…あっ、どうもどうも、すみません、すみませんｗ
subtitles.english: Wait, the script flipping... Oh, hello hello, sorry, sorry lol

subtitles.original: はい！そして次でなんと、もう一時間の最後の曲になってしまうんですが、
subtitles.english: Okay! And next, somehow, is already the last song of the hour,

subtitles.original: あー！
subtitles.english: Aww!

subtitles.original: ここで告知があります！
subtitles.english: but we have an announcement here!

subtitles.original: なに、なに？
subtitles.english: What, what?

subtitles.original: ちょっとお二人はガヤお願いしますｗ
subtitles.english: You two, please provide some background noise lol
